user.description: You must get an API key from https://n2yo.com/api to use this integration.

data.type: Select the type of sensors to add. Satellite will track an individual satellite, Location will track all satellites at your specified location.

data.name: Enter the name for this location.
data.category: Select the category of satellites to track.
data.latitude: Enter the latitude (default your Home Assistant location).
data.elevation: Enter the elevation from sea level.

data.name: Enter the name of the satellite.
data.sat_id: Enter the satellite NORAD ID (default the ISS).
data.latitude: Enter the latitude for visibility (default your Home Assistant location).
data.elevation: Enter the elevation from sea level.

data.scan_interval: Enter your polling interval in seconds.
data.radius: Enter the radius for your overhead location sensors.
data.min_visibility: Enter the minimum visibility time for satellite passes in seconds.
data.min_alert: Enter the minimum degrees for pass alerts.
